item.description:
Come join us for a Pagan Night out on the town!

We will be going first for dinner, at PJ's Bar & Grill, that has something for everyone!
They have new owners, and not only are they friendly, but the food is excellent, and
reasonably priced!

Check out their site at:
http://www.pjsbarandg....

After dinner, we will be going to see the 5th Harry Potter movie,
"The Half- Blood Prince" which will be coming out in July....
Hopefully the "craze" will have died down by the time we go!

After, we will be going out to the Alegro, where we can have coffee, teas, cocoa,
or alcoholic beverages, and wonderful desserts, to discuss the movie and socialize!

People are invited to come to some, or all of the activities planned, and it promised to be
a fun night out on the town! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the meet up group
item.name: A Pagan Night Out
